answerText: Republic Kiribati [or Kiribas; or Ribaberiki Kiribati][10] Kiribati plans to relocate all of its citizens to this other country, comprised of the two large islands Viti Levu and Vauna Levu.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Penn and Wake Forest | 3 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This nation's president Anote Tong has become an advocate for climate change awareness, since some of this nation's thirty-two atolls have already disappeared due to rising sea levels. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this Pacific island nation, which has already purchased land on a nearby island in anticipation of eventually relocating the entire country.
